item.title: Data Science
item.description: Bellow there are some of my Data Science Projects that I share here on my Blog: Time Series Analysis e-Commerce Time-Series Analysis Part 1: Intro and Exploratory Data Analysis e-Commerce Time-Series Analysis Part 2: Forecast Sales using Classical Models e-Commerce Time-Series Analysis Part 3: Forecast Sales using ARIMA and SARIMA Models Multivariate Time Series Analysis
